TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Squliq, title = Squliq, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Squliq} }

S.FORM: squliq squliq hya' ga pinbcyan na minqyanux babaw uraw qaniy, qaniy hya' ga sinbcyan sa lamu' na ini' ptnaq na minqyanux, nanu' kwara' qu squliq ru qqsinuw, ru qqbhniq, ru qlqulih, ru kwara' ka kaykuwi'. nma' ta' baqun maha squliq hya' ga maki' sqaniy qu sinqaysan na gluw qaniy hya' ga, kya qutux luhay kkayal na bnkis sraral ga, mutuw kmayal maha "ita' squliq hya' ga, ini' ptnaq sa qsinuw giy ini' ta' pinhmut mqyanux ita', qsinuw hya' hya ungat sayux naha' laha, ungat gaga' na qsinuw hya." qutux kkayal hya' sun maha squliq qaniy hya' ga, ini' pgluw qu ginlhuyan ga squloiq sawn naha', niwan maha iyat ta' gluw maha qu kay' qasa hya'. skahul ta' squw sinbcyan na ubuy gluw na squliq lmpuw lga, maki' kya quw sawn naha' 'tayal ru Baybuzyuq ru Bunun. itan ga balay balay na squliq.

sqoliq sqoliq hya' ga pinbcyan na minqyanox babaw oraw qaniy, qaniy hya' ga sinbcyan sa lamo' na ini' ptnaq na minqyanox, nano' kwara' qo sqoliq ro qqsinow, ro qqbhniq, ro qlqolih, ro kwara' ka kaykowi'. nma' ta' baqon maha sqoliq hya' ga maki' sqaniy qo sinqaysan na glow qaniy hya' ga, kya qotox lohay kkayal na bnkis sraral ga, motow kmayal maha "ita' sqoliq hya' ga, ini' ptnaq sa qsinow giy ini' ta' pinhmot mqyanox ita', qsinow hya' hya ongat sayox naha' laha, ongat gaga' na qsinow hya." qotox kkayal hya' son maha sqoliq qaniy hya' ga, ini' pglow qo ginlhoyan ga sqoloiq sawn naha', niwan maha iyat ta' glow maha qo kay' qasa hya'. skahol ta' sqow sinbcyan na oboy glow na sqoliq lmpow lga, maki' kya qow sawn naha' 'tayal ro Baybozyoq ro Bonon. itan ga balay balay na sqoliq.
